article_title: Ellmers brings incumbent’s advantages to campaign against ‘Idol’ star
article_text: US Rep. Renee Ellmers has staff connections and experience to show as she runs for a third term, facing a political newcomer with a household name from “American Idol.”

article_metadata.news-keywords: Renee Ellmers, Clay Aiken, 2nd Congressional District, elections, campaigns
